document_data.caption: The Coast Trail on a map of Calimshan.
document_data.name: Coast Trail
document_data.mainbody:
'''The Coast Trail''' was a alternative to the [[Trade Way]] as a means to travel from [[Calimport]] to [[Memnon]], avoiding the [[Calim Desert]].<ref name=EotSS-p80/>

As the name suggests, the trail followed the windy coast along the southern and western edges of [[Calimshan]]. The path was only wide enough for a single cart and covered rocky terrain, but it was far enough from the effects of [[Memnon (efreeti)|Memnon's Crackle]]. The trail was primarily used by adventurers or other vagabonds. Many hermits, smugglers, or other folk who wished to live undetected built structures a mile or so off the path.<ref name=EotSS-p80/>

Besides Calimport and Memnon, the town of [[Teshburl]] lies along the trail,<ref name=EotSS-p80/> as does the [[House of St. Liwan's Blessing]], a monastery to [[Ilmater]].<ref name=EotSS-p97>
